meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #545.

td.p: Mark Palmer, a financial proofreader from Long Beach, California
George Neil, a copywriter from Los Angeles, California
Patty Godon-Tann, a teacher from Santa Monica, California

tr.td: U.S. HISTORY
TELEVISION
RED SHOES
PSYCH 101
PLANTS
"AN"IMALS

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Patty: What is the anniversary of the flag made by Betsy Ross?)
(Alex: Be more specific.)
(Patty: It\'s the 100th anniversary of the flag.)
(Alex: That\'s it!)

the 100th anniversary of the flag

Patty
')
